```{python}
import altair as alt

from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())
```


```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon"
)
```

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()

```

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()

```

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(

    y="Miles_per_Gallon",
    color="Origin",
    shape="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Weight_in_lbs"]
).interactive()

```

`count()` De Cada uno de los Origenes

### Agregaciones 
 Grafico de barar

Número de Obervaciones
```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('count()')
) 
```

`mean()` de cada uno de los origines

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    tooltip=['Origin','mean(Weight_in_lbs)']
).properties(
    width=200,
    height=200
)
```

### Gráfico Linea


```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_line(point=True).encode(
    alt.X('Year'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    alt.Color('Origin'),
).properties(
    width=600,
    height=600
).interactive()
```
